days.overview: James promises that if anyone lacks wisdom, they should ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach. Wisdom is available to those who ask in faith.
days.reflection: What decisions require wisdom? How do you ask God for wisdom? What does it mean that God gives without reproach?
days.prayer: Ask God for wisdom in specific situations you're facing, trusting He will give generously.

days.overview: Solomon instructs: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make straight your paths.
days.reflection: Where are you relying on your own understanding? What does it mean to trust God with all your heart? How do you acknowledge God in all your ways?
days.prayer: Commit to trusting God fully and acknowledging Him in every area of your life.

days.overview: Paul reveals that in Christ are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge. True wisdom is found in relationship with Jesus, not apart from Him.
days.reflection: How is Christ the source of wisdom? What treasures of wisdom have you found in Him? Where are you seeking wisdom apart from Christ?
days.prayer: Thank Jesus for being your wisdom and ask Him to reveal His treasures to you.

days.overview: Solomon declares that wisdom is supremeâ€”therefore get wisdom. Though it cost all you have, get understanding. Wisdom is worth any price.
days.reflection: What would you sacrifice to gain wisdom? How are you actively pursuing wisdom? What does it mean that wisdom is supreme?
days.prayer: Commit to pursuing wisdom above all else, whatever the cost.
